original_text: You have profaned me among my people for a few handfuls of barley and scraps of bread. By lying to my people, who listen to lies, you have killed those who should not have died and have spared those who should not live.
korean_text: 너희가 두어 움큼 보리와 두어 조각 떡을 위하여 나를 내 백성 가운데에서 욕되게 하여 거짓말을 곧이 듣는 내 백성에게 너희가 거짓말을 지어내어 죽지 아니할 영혼을 죽이고 살지 못할 영혼을 살리는도다

sentences.original_text: You have profaned me among my people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내 백성 중에서 나를 더럽혔습니다

sentences.original_text: for a few handfuls of barley and scraps of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 몇 줌의 보리와 빵 부스러기를 위해

sentences.original_text: you have killed those who should not have died
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 죽지 말았어야 할 사람들을 죽였습니다

sentences.original_text: and have spared those who should not live
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 살아서는 안 될 사람들을 살려두었습니다
